p: There are today numerous antioxidants in cosmetics that have the possibility of reducing the pigmentation level of the skin. Some of these substances possess a high tyrosinase-inhibiting effect that reduces total melanin production. Arbutin, a well-known natural antioxidant contained in bilberries and pears, has been developed as the strongest tyrosinase inhibitor and is widely utilized in cosmetics and personal-care products due especially to its mild side effects [ 185].
